summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by widening the existing roadway and paving the same, all in accordance with Petition No. 108,417 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
